verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God above all the world in motion newline God above all my hopes and fears newline And I don't care what the world throws at me now newline I'm gonna be alright

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hear the sound of the generations newline Making loud their freedom song newline All in all, that the world would know Your Name newline We're gonna be alright

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 'Cause I know my God saved the day newline And I know his Word never fails newline And I know my God made a way for me newline Salvation is here

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Salvation is here newline Salvation is here and he lives in me newline Salvation is here newline Salvation that died just to set me free newline Salvation is here newline Salvation is here and he lives in me newline Salvation is here newline 'Cause You are alive and You live in me newline Salvation is here newline Salvation is here and he lives in me newline Salvation is here newline 'Cause you are alive and you live in me
